ovdesc.p: The T24 Browser screen is represented by various objects with Input fields as Web Edit objects, No input fields as Web Elements, Menus as links etc. Such Objects that are present in the BROWSER Interface such Browser, page, Web element etc are defined in this application.

desc.p: Standard Descriptive field where the description of the Object can be defined.
Refers to the name of the standard UI Object that would be used in Scripting.
